name: EUROPEAN FEDERATION OF COTTON AND ALLIED TEXTILES INDUSTRIES
goal:
In brief: representing the economic interests of its members, lobbying and advocacy and, of course, sending information to its members. The purpose is to defend production, employment and investments in Europe for its industry and to preserve, as long as possible, the entire industrial production chain of the textile and clothing sector in the EU.

The objectives of EUROCOTON are:
- to defend and promote the common interests of the European cotton companies;
- to define and express the position of the cotton textile industries affiliated to EUROCOTON;
- to represent the interests of the cotton industry vis-à-vis the authorities and public institutions, particularly the European Communities;
- to represent the interests of the cotton industry within EURATEX and any other organisation the objective of which is related to its members' interests;
- to keep and reinforce the permanent contact among the member organisations and with the other European textile branches;
- to centralise and circulate information likely to be of interest to member organisations, particularly that in connection with the European Union;
- to examine common problems of general interest in the legal, economic, financial, fiscal or technical fields;
- to establish, with the agreement of member organisations, contacts with any organisation outside the European Union;
- to establish, on the Board of Directors' initiative, relations with other countries' cotton textile associations.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Customs, External Relations, Single market, Trade
